body.name: RG35XX Plus Retro Video Handheld Game Console Linux System 3.5 in IPS Screen Built-in 3300mAH Battery 64G TF Card Preinstalled 5500 Classic Games(White)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 38 mins
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 38 mins
features: High Performance: The RG35XX Plus handheld game console is equipped with a powerful H700 quad-core ARM Cortex-A53 CPU, running at a frequency of 1.5GHz. This ensures smooth and efficient performance, allowing you to enjoy your favorite games without any lag or slowdowns.

Immersive Viewing Experience: The 3.5-inch IPS full viewing angle screen with OCA full lamination technology offers a crystal-clear display. With a resolution of 640*480, you can enjoy sharp and vibrant visuals, bringing your games to life.

Extensive Game Compatibility: This console supports a wide range of game formats, including PSP, PS1, DC, ARCADE, GBA, GBC, GB, SFC, FC, MAME, MD, GG, PCE, NGPC, SMS, WSC, and more. Additionally, users can easily download games in relevant formats, expanding their gaming library.

Long-lasting Battery Life: The built-in Li-polymer battery with a capacity of 3300mAh ensures up to 8 hours of gameplay on a single charge. This allows you to enjoy uninterrupted gaming sessions without worrying about running out of power.

Convenient Connectivity and Accessories: The RG35XX Plus comes with 2.4/5G WIFI 802.11a/b/g/n/ac and Bluetooth 4.2, providing seamless wireless connectivity options. It also supports HDMI output for connecting to a TV, allowing you to play games on a larger screen. Additionally, the console supports 2.4G wireless and wired controllers, and comes with essential accessories like a USB charging cable, user manual, and screen protector.
body.description: Model: RG35XX Plus Color: Transparent black/Gray/ WhiteScreen: 3.5-inch IPS full viewing angle, OCA full lamination/ 640*480CPU: H700 quad-core ARM Cortex-A53, 1.5GHz frequencyGPU: dual- core G31 MP2RAM: LPDDR4 1GBMemory: 16GB TF/MicroSDSystem: Linux WIFI/Bluetooth: 2.4/5G WIFI 802.11a/b/g/n/ac,Bluetooth 4.2 Games: Support PSP, PS1, DC, ARCADE, GBA, GBC, GB, SFC, FC, MAME, MD, GG, PCE, NGPC, SMS, WSC and other games in various formats. Support users to download games in relevant formats.Language: Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish Speaker: High-fidelity speaker TF card: Dual card slots, support TF card expansion, maximum 512GB Battery: Li-polymer battery 3300mAh, lasting 8 hours Charging: 5V/1.5A, support C2C charger Other function : Support 2.4G wireless and wired controller,.Bluetooth Handle Connection,HDMI output TV,vibration motor.WIFI online pairing, streamingAccessories: USB charging cable, user manual, screen protector

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For the price it’s worth it even if you are paying $15-20 more on Amazon instead of importing it.Controls are solid. Very light weight feels a little cheap but screen is gorgeous.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fun but having issues
reviews.reviewText: Bought this about a week ago and was quickly impressed with the hardware. But after a few days, the software started to get buggy. There are 2 different ways to open the emulators. The "game room" which i never had issues with, and then there was "ra game" which quickly became non working for me. No matter what game I clicked under "ra game", it would be basically bricked. The game would turn on but no buttons would work. I couldn't adjust the volume or start the game or anything. So I was forced to ask Amazon for a replacement and I hope this one doesn't have the same issues because otherwise, I was really enjoying using this system. We'll see what happens .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not the full experience of gaming consoles but for the price it's worth it. It's fun playing alone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good emulation for price
reviews.reviewText: For the price you can't beat PSP emulation.
